greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Period of continued fraction for square root of n (or 1 if n is a square).
example: 1 is a square. 2 has continued fraction [1;2,2,2...], 3 has [1;1,2,1,2,1,2...]. - _Georg Fischer_, Jun 14 2019
xref: See A003285, which is the main entry for this sequence.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 01 2004
